channel.title: Annie Lvl2
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Annie Lvl2" - Probable changes due to the crank

item.title: Re: Annie Lvl2
item.content:encoded:
You must be getting Crank 1 in Season 1 using Survived the Impossible, yes? McMasters just changed the system slightly for old content:

Mission Unlock Change Due to everyone freaking out, the current missions that used to require, say, S2, and now require Crank 1, are BACK to just requiring S2. Everything new, however, will be crank based.

item.title: Re: Annie Lvl2
item.content:encoded: I dont get it?? im on crank 1 and i still can't get annie lv2!?!?!?

item.title: Re: Annie Lvl2
item.content:encoded: thanks for the answer jadian. I figured this might be the case but better safe asking than sorry for not making sure.

item.title: Re: Annie Lvl2
item.content:encoded:
It's only been in for like, two days or so. Prior to that, there was no adjustable difficulty, there was just the +1/+1 to all regular missions' difficulty/success each time you looped, and later-season content was just based on how many times you'd looped.

Since you didn't notice it before now, it must have been added some time after you did your Season 3 run.

item.title: Re: Annie Lvl2
item.content:encoded: One thing thoughâ€¦ I picked up Annie Lvl2 on my season 3 run.. but I honestly didnt pay any attention to the crank level and got her. It was still set at 0 the first time i checked it. I presume this is what McM just put out right?

item.title: Re: Annie Lvl2
item.content:encoded: Running at crank zero is now like running in S1. The drops and the level ups that aren't available until S2+ won't show up until you crank up to 1+.

item.title: Re: Annie Lvl2
item.content:encoded: I think the reason is because you are running on crank level 0. I think she is one of those allies that will only level up when you have crank level 1 or crank level 2, considering she can only level up on S2+.

item.title: Annie Lvl2
item.content:encoded: Not sure if this has been mentioned already, but Annie didnt level up for me on the B rank Teach a class mission. In fact there was no text to even suggest an ally could level on that mission. I was running on crank level zero in season 3. Tomorrow I'll be running level 1 and possibly level 2 if i still cant get her to level up. Just for clarity I have 100% chance to level up an ally.
